name: COMLoader
short_description:
COMLoader is a console-based, 35 KB small executable file which was designed to be a small, yet powerful file downloader.
It can be downloaded in one single COM file.

You can download files by entering them into the input, starting it with command line arguments, or by pasting the URL from your clipboard, which can be done a right-click anywhere in the console window and pressing "Paste".

COMLoader requires the .NET Framework 2.0.
summary: Probably the most small tool to download files.
